general.name: Trung Nguyen
general.headline: Fullstack Developer | Aspiring DevOps Engineer
about: I am a back-end developer passionate about building efficient, scalable applications, specializing in API design, database management, and system integration. I am transitioning into DevOps, expanding my skills in cloud computing, automation, and infrastructure management to deliver faster, reliable software solutions. Committed to continuous learning, I aim to bridge development and operations for impactful results.
I may not have all the answers, but I am committed to finding solutions and learning along the way.

experiences.title: Back-end Developer Intership
experiences.description: developing, and maintaining scalable back-end applications using Python, FastAPI, Golang, Elasticsearch, and MySQL to deliver high-performance and reliable solutions.

education.subject: Software Engineering
education.description: Major in Software Engineering with a strong focus on back-end development and system design.
honors: Top 100 Software Engineering Students of the Semester (2024)

volunteering.description: Organized and contributed to the distribution of food, essential items, toys, and school supplies to underprivileged children. This initiative aimed to bring joy and support to children in challenging circumstances, ensuring they could celebrate a meaningful and memorable Mid-Autumn Festival.

projects.name: Kit Stem Hub Website
projects.description: A web platform providing interactive educational kits. Customers can request technical support for their labs, and staff members assist accordingly.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: An e-commerce platform where customers can browse and purchase products, similar to Shopee or Lazada.
